name: Kaleigh Braginton
text: They're great! We ordered a pizza that was just a little bit late and they gave us a free howie's bread! The deliverer also forgot to hand us our pop but he came right back and gave it to us üòä They were very kind and handled everything perfectly!

name: Chuck Premer
text: Good pizza, friendly staff.  This is my goto pizza spot for a quick dinner.  Use the online order for great customization of your pizza

name: Angel Trujillo
text: You can park your Truck in the truck parking lot of Arby‚Äôs and walk and get good service and Very good food

name: Brandon Beyer
text: I was charged $30 for a large pizza, wow!!! Obviously they freeze then defrost their veggies because they lose all flavors. I couldn't find the sauce, none there. Bland, boring, seriously tasteless, way more expensive than every pizza place ‚Ä¶More

name: Rebecca Maycroft
text: One of my favorite places to get pizza...i live in Muskegon so I don't get to eat here very often, so it makes it extra special when I wander that way

name: Brandi S
text: I‚Äôm waiting for over an hour, I‚Äôm back and forth to the door, have my phone in hand. No call, no knock, no one in the driveway. I call the store, was told he couldn‚Äôt find my place and he called me but I didn‚Äôt answer (not true at all). The ‚Ä¶More

name: jared williamson
text: Not 5 stars because it's fast food pizza, there are better places in town, but Howie's is passable. Where Hungry Howie's shines is the fact they deliver, they are open late, and their drivers have so far been quick and courteous.

name: Angela Comai
text: Great service and great pizza!  Their boneless BBQ wings are great!

name: Derek Harper
text: I would give no stars if I could but its not a possibility!  As for that being said the management team at this location is so rude and misinformed that I don't know whether to blame corporate or the location itself. The professionalism is ‚Ä¶More

name: Makenzy Dick
text: Last night we ordered a large 2 topping pizza. We patiently waited for too long in my opinion, as we live 3 minutes down the road. We recieved the pizza and paid the driver. Who was excellent by the way. We open the pizza and there‚Äôs no ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer R
text: I have ordered from here since 2002 and it's still the best pizza shop that I've done business with. They have really great coupons and deals if you look for them. Their staff is always friendly and has my family's name and order memorized. Be patient as there is a frequent turnover in staff. But I promise a good pizza will come from it.

name: Brady
text: Pizza is always hot and it's always correct the online option is really handy

name: zachary Raider
text: One of the only places that delivers nearby. Kinda pricy, but nice staff. Don't get the boneless wings.

name: Nicole Vandy Bogurt
text: They always take at least 30 minutes to an hour to deliver (we live 5 minutes down the road). Today, the delivery driver unfortunate had a flat and they told us they would send another driver with a fresh pizza. Two hours later they arrive ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Bennett
text: Fast friendly service great food

name: DFC Juice
text: Pretty good pizza. I like the square thick crust with garlic and herb crust. Its a nice place for a delicious quick bite

name: bill thompson
text: The food was divine, the flavor was not achieved with salt,it was achieved by good cooking. If you are ever in the area and you don't eat here, you are definitely missing out.

name: grant weaver
text: Hadn't been to Hungry Howie's in over 10 years. Made the trek from Grand Haven and man...was it worth it. The staff was funny and friendly. The food was amazing! Converted 2 first timers to HH's lol. Will definitely be back again soon. Keep up the great work!!!

name: Katie Lasich
text: We live in Nunica and always gone to Marcos in Spring Lake. But today the bridge between Grand Haven & Spring Lake was stuck up. So we tried this place. I just deleted Marcos from my phone. Awesome Pizza üòç

name: Lauren Michelle
text: It took 1 hour and 33 minutes to deliver our 2 pizzas when they told us that it would take 40 minutes. When we called after an hour, we were told ‚Äúwell, what do you want me to do about it? It will be there when it gets there‚Äù...this was the manager...we live less than a mile away. Horrible service and the pizza was freezing cold.

name: Mary Schauer
text: Great quality pizza place

name: Lorri Falan
text: There were 3 short black hairs baked into my pizza. Disgusting!

name: Steven Beauchamp
text: Very good pizza and bread sticks.

name: Brad Lambert
text: Won't be back again, ordered a 14" pizza and small order of wings, come to $29. Got home to Ravenna and opened the box to eat it and the crust was so burned you couldn't hard chew through it. Never again.

name: Brian Murphy
text: Really great pizza with delicious flavored crust.  The lunch deals are also something worth trying.

name: Steve Cunningham
text: Stayed at the roadway inn for an extensive repair on my semi truck...their delivery was pretty quick and the food was still hot...as for the food....finaminal( dont know irf thats spelled right...lol)...any way...thier subs are unsurpassed ‚Ä¶More

name: Buffy Alonzo
text: Food was awesome and done when they said it would be.however prices are very high.

name: Brent Veldheer
text: Veggie thin crust was great.

name: Kathy Cook
text: It was very good. Food was good and so was the service

name: Mark Johnson
text: Good pizza, sign up for their email discounts. Pizza at a good price.

name: Brenda Lasko
text: Awesome pizza, great crust, fresh toppings.

name: Archie Nieswander
text: Meh, its HH, consistent at medicore

name: Timothy Henderson
text: Employees did their job efficiently, best pizza I have ever had from a HH.

name: Jacob Staley
text: This joint is good add usual, and the food always taste the same if you're looking for the same flavor pizza. They have only messed up my order once with the crust flavoring, but other then that I am still a repeat customer.

name: Michael Ivinson
text: Been here a few times, we always walk in and order and the food is done pretty quick and is always prepared well and tastes great, staff is friendly

name: rdneck64
text: Never had an issue with them no reason they don't deserve 5 stars in my book.

name: Kevin D

text: They have great customer service and the Howie bread sticks are delicious

name: Adam Fleminger

text:
Our Coopersville Hungry Howie's Pizza Staff are always Friendly and delivery is always prompt!!!
Great food and fast delivery

name: Tonya Phillips

text: I placed an order for delivery and I was told it'll be about 40 mins. I ordered a personal pizza an a thing of breadsticks, I called an hour later and was told it should be about 10 more mins.

text: The only thing going on with this place is that the on line ordering seems to double back everytime I use it. And I think they should be opened later but that is just cause we are late night people
